application.doc: Retrieving the list of all files in the API Access Control documentation root

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy Instance.

param.name: recursive
param.doc: If this parameter is set to true the response will include a recursive listing of files from all directories not just the specified directory.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the list of all files in the API Access Control documentation root.
method.doc: To retrieve the list of all files in the API Access Control documentation root with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control documentation URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: type
param.doc: Resource type. Valid values are "file" and "directory".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of the file. This is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
